subject: Web3
title: DeFi Composability
description: A quick, practical guide to DeFi Composability.

hook.text: DeFi protocols are like Lego bricks. You can stack them to build financial products that never existed before.

buildup.text: Deposit into Aave, use the receipt token in Curve, stake the Curve token for extra yield â€” all in one transaction.

discovery.text: This composability is called 'money Legos.' Each protocol builds on others, creating increasingly complex products.

twist.text: When one brick fails, the whole stack can collapse. Composability creates systemic risk across connected protocols.

climax.text: Composability is DeFi's superpower and its Achilles heel. Innovation and risk grow together.

punchline.text: Money Legos build amazing things. Pull one out and everything falls.

quiz.question: What risk does DeFi composability create?
options: Failure in one protocol can cascade across interconnected protocols
